hero.subtitle: We select specialists who move businesses forward. We organize everything so that the hiring process for you takes place with minimal time and effort. We help companies attract irreplaceable employees, and talented specialists find top employers.

whom.title: Whom we find
whom.subtitle: We find people who are able to grow, move forward, and scale your business

convenient.title: Convenient service
convenient.text: On your part, recruiting employees requires a minimum of time. A 15-20 minute call—and we will fill out the brief ourselves and clarify everything necessary. Are you comfortable communicating by voice? Accepted. Special requirements? No problem.

smart.title: Smart approach and innovation
smart.text:
We use a smart bot and artificial intelligence to process hundreds of resumes in minutes and find exactly the people your business needs.

3000+ resumes in the database and a smart tagging system make it possible to find candidates for regular positions on the day of application.

look.title: We look at the task of recruiting employees globally and find rare specialists in non-standard places
look.text:
We don’t just offer candidates, but find people who will develop and scale your business. Each in their place.

Along with the standard search on HH and LinkedIn, we work with professional communities and chats, connect networks and direct contacts, use creative advertising.

develop.title: We develop our own community of HR specialists
develop.text: We know what the market is breathing, we keep our finger on the pulse of the industry and are always aware of the current situation with the employees you need, where to look for them and what conditions to offer so that they come to work for you and not for your competitors.

experience.title: 20 years experience
experience.text: We know all the inner workings of IT/digital/affiliate, all the pains of owners/CEOs and have direct access to specialists who will never appear on HeadHunter, do not shine on LinkedIn, but have the necessary experience and knowledge to move your business forward.

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: Impeccable service. Minimum effort and time on your part—maximum result

steps.step_1: A short intro call for 15-20 minutes to find out who exactly you need.
steps.step_2: We prepare the brief ourselves, agree on it with you and supplement it if necessary.
steps.step_3: We search, interview and test candidates completely on our side.
steps.step_4: We send to you only those who have passed our selection filter and ideally match your position.
steps.step_5: We select a new candidate for free within 3 months if the first one does not pass the trial period.
steps.step_6: You pay for our services only after the employee has successfully worked for 2 weeks.

companies.label: Companies
companies.description:
We will find the right candidates ready for you within 1 to 2 weeks. Along with their CVs, we will send you a 15-minute video from the first interview and the results of 4 psychological tests. This way, you can get to know the candidates and pick the best ones even before meeting them in person.
All that'd be left for you to do is conduct the final interviews and pick the candidate who best meets your requirements and vision.

specialists.label: Specialists
specialists.description:
We will help you find top employers and exciting job opportunities, even if you’re not job-hunting right now.
Don’t have a CV? No problem! Our smart bot will help you create one in just 5 minutes. We will also guide you through a series of psychological tests, prepare you for interviews, and record a video self-presentation. All of these materials are yours to keep and use however you like.

partners.label: Partners
partners.description: Earn 7% of all payments from customers who come to us through your recommendation.

flexibly.title: If you don’t need a turnkey selection
flexibly.subtitle: We flexibly adapt to your needs and tasks

recruiter.title: Recruiter on a retainer
recruiter.text: We provide an experienced recruiter who will strengthen your team, connect to internal hiring processes and help find the right employees or assemble a startup/department/team.

hr.title: HR on a retainer
hr.text: We assign a specialist who will establish HR processes, set up a CRM system, and digitize the corporate culture. From hiring and onboarding employees to holding corporate events and ordering merch - anything to suit your needs and requests.

sourcing.title: Sourcing
sourcing.text: We will provide 300 resumes for your request, from which you can choose suitable candidates yourself. Before getting to you, each candidate goes through our verification system, 4 psychological tests and several stages of preliminary interviews.

inTouch.title: Get in touch
inTouch.subtitle: We will contact you within 24 hours and begin work on finding employees for your business
